channel.title: ScottHansonDE tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from ScottHansonDE.

item.description: @jenrazzle @HejM0 Hope seems like it was a century ago https://t.co/0RjLcGuIBf

This train wreck was over 10 years in the making, and the party that would have, could have, should have prevented it… didn’t.
I decided a few years to let that party wander aimlessly without me (but they still have my vote) and joined a German party. I may not be able to vote here yet, but I helped pick party leaders and a Chancellor candidate who’s now in power.
And is checking off the boxes on their campaign promises, like just today on freedom of information for abortion providers https://t.co/lDiTROwiTX
Political involvement is also part business strategy. My wife belongs to the other main German party, but the left wing of the one party overlaps a lot with the right wing of the other. We then have a foot in the door of a lot of politicians where we can voice our concerns.
Or to do good. Through personal, media and political contacts, we were able to prevent an Afghan couple who work for us from deportation. They’ve now become permanent residents. /Fin https://t.co/nR59In9Amk

@HejM0 @cdir @PurlTurtle I always thought it was Hamburg slang, but for a younger demographic so what do I know
@HejM0 @cdir @PurlTurtle ‘Wie Berliner häufig „Alter“ sagen, benutzen Hamburger nun mal gerne „Digga“.’ https://t.co/wY21zhhHD6
Unser neues Wort heißt „Arbeiterlosigkeit“
@tessaapproves That’s like a flat pie
@Lynn_Nothegger 2020 was all messed up for us, but at least we had the taxes done last October. But yeah, big Nachzahlung.
Hmmm, good thing I didn’t call https://t.co/LKb75m9rnb

My wife drives a plug-in hybrid (her EV is on order), but drives in EV mode whenever she can. She hasn’t filled up the gas tank in 3 months, and now the car complains that her gas is getting old… 🤣 https://t.co/RUQjQUaNaC
@bzbear2 I heard on the news last night that on midsummer Hamburg has an hour more daylight than Munich. I didn’t realize the difference was so much.
Oh, GitHub is going start charging for GitHub Copilot. Too bad, but I can understand that Microsoft needs the money. https://t.co/OrJ4Y1jT52
@summeroutside House of Gucci was great, and I also watched it on a plane 😀

So given the piles of luggage from missed connections at European hub airports, for our US trip in July we should switch to a 3 hour layover in Amsterdam instead of 1 hour (even if it means leaving for the airport at 3:30 am).
@bzbear2 Sunrise at 4:52 am, this was about an hour before
@Lynn_Nothegger Because Germans are druids and it’s a holy day for them
I’m too lazy to click 4 times each to download 10 e-cash statements each week, so I wrote a script in Puppeteer to do it for me (in real time it takes 3 minutes). https://t.co/S9A1jRxtGF
Got up at night for a glass of water and had to chase intruders off our lawn https://t.co/Bl325aZjny
Not only did the end of the Hurricane festival bring record guest counts to our Autobahn restaurant, but this afternoon we were sold out of McVegan! #TheFutureOfFastFood
@linavasili Doing stock is fun! Hope you followed FIFO! 😂
Seen on the streets today: red Dodge Ram pickup, license plate frame from New York, National Rifle Association sticker, White Privilege banner, local license plate number 🙄
@SteveVickersDE We had no heat just south of Hamburg. 18°C with occasional drizzle.

We weren’t going to run relay this year, but a couple of injuries mean we’re filling in. #BuchholzerStadtlauf https://t.co/Wzqg0EmJtZ
And the after pic. Two Afghans, an American and a German, so my rainbow socks are quite appropriate. Don’t ask about our time, “dabei sein ist alles!” https://t.co/4vMUzZ7i67
And aging is just a cruel joke on your body, right? Running 5K with only one practice run I would have expected my legs or my feet to hurt afterwards, but it’s my upper back! #60plus
@_Sibylle @tessaapproves I was speaking in general as someone whose wife falls asleep during *every* series. We’ve never actually watched Succession. 😀
@tessaapproves If you fall asleep it’s your own fault. Weiter machen!
@gingerarab Same here
@faerirose @Heather_inDE @MCinHD @gingerarab @c0urtneyH @germany_iam Long running mystery solved, at least for me! 😛
